Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

RegionBootstrap

public RegionBootstrap(BootstrapNotifier application,
                       Region region)
Constructor to bootstrap your Application on an entry/exit from a single region. Do not use this class if you are using the ProximityKitManager, because equivalent functionality is built-in to that class will cause conflicts. If using ProximityKitManager, ensure that the start method is called in the onCreate method of your Application class to enable equivalent functionality.

Parameters:
application -
region -

RegionBootstrap

public RegionBootstrap(BootstrapNotifier application,
                       java.util.List regions)
Constructor to bootstrap your Application on an entry/exit from multiple regions

Parameters:
application -
regions -
Method Detail

disable

public void disable()
Used to disable additional bootstrap callbacks after the first is received. Unless this is called, your application will be get additional calls as the supplied regions are entered or exited.
